sensor-view.temperature_description: The currently measured temperature in the surrounding area.
sensor-view.perceived-temperature_description: The temperature as it feels due to the combination of wind and humidity.
sensor-view.wind-chill_description: The perceived temperature caused by the cooling effect of the wind.
sensor-view.leaf-temperature_description: The current temperature measured on plant leaves.
sensor-view.soil-temperature_description: The current soil temperature, measured within the ground layer.
sensor-view.soil-moisture_description: The currently measured moisture content of the soil.
sensor-view.solar-radiation_description: The current intensity of solar radiation in the area.
sensor-view.wind-speed_description: The current speed of the wind.
sensor-view.wind-gust_description: The highest measured wind gust speed at the moment.
sensor-view.wind-direction_description: The currently measured direction from which the wind is blowing.
sensor-view.uv_description: The current UV index, indicating the level of ultraviolet radiation from the sun.
sensor-view.evaporation_description: The amount of water currently evaporating into the atmosphere.
sensor-view.leaf-wetness_description: The degree of wetness on the surface of leaves, as currently measured.
sensor-view.pressure_description: The current atmospheric pressure, measured at ground level.
sensor-view.precipation_description: The total amount of precipitation measured today.
sensor-view.precipation-probability_description: The estimated probability of precipitation occurring.
sensor-view.humidity_description: The currently measured relative humidity in the air.
sensor-view.cloudiness_description: The current level of cloud cover in the sky.
sensor-view.sunshine_description: The duration of sunshine measured in the past hour.
sensor-view.visibility_description: The current visibility, measured in kilometers.
sensor-view.snow-height_description: The currently measured snow height in the area.
sensor-view.weather-state_description: The current general condition of the weather.
sensor-view.soil-ph_description: The currently measured acidity or alkalinity level (pH) of the soil.

login.login-message: You are currently not logged in. Please log in to access the admin panel.

connection-state.disconnected-message: The weather station is currently not reachable. Please check the connection and try again.
